double-pendulum-chaos.title: Double Pendulum Chaos: Visualizing Sensitive Dependence
double-pendulum-chaos.excerpt: Interactive simulation of multiple double pendulums demonstrating chaotic behavior and sensitive dependence on initial conditions.

gradient-optimizer-comparison.title: Gradient Optimizer Comparison: Racing Through Loss Landscapes
gradient-optimizer-comparison.excerpt: Interactive comparison of gradient descent optimizers including SGD, Adam, Muon, and Shampoo navigating 2D loss landscapes.

neural-scaling-laws.title: Interactive Neural Scaling Laws: Exploring the Chinchilla Frontier
neural-scaling-laws.excerpt: Interactive visualization of neural scaling laws showing the relationships between model size, data, compute, and loss. Explore compute-optimal frontiers and understand the mathematics behind efficient model scaling.

random-walks-visualization.title: Visualizing Random Walks
random-walks-visualization.excerpt: Interactive visualization and exploration of random walks in 2D space with real-time statistics.

welcome-to-my-blog.title: Welcome to My Blog
welcome-to-my-blog.excerpt: An introduction to my personal blog.

liquid-crystal-society.title: A Liquid Crystal Society: Modeling Human-AI Collective Dynamics
liquid-crystal-society.excerpt: Mathematical framework for collective opinion dynamics in mixed human-AI societies, using liquid crystal physics to understand ideological alignment and fragmentation.

ablated-knowledge-ood-training.title: Proposal: Training LLMs with Ablated Knowledge to Measure Truly Out-of-Distribution Abilities
ablated-knowledge-ood-training.excerpt: A novel training methodology for evaluating genuine reasoning in LLMs by deliberately creating controlled epistemic gaps through knowledge domain ablation during pretraining.
